Yes, I am writing this review because of the steam awards, but I'm also writing it because I freaking love Portal 2. It is the game I cherish the most, here's why:

[b] The Game is Unique:[/b] Gameplay style like this has never been seen before, and without combat, it is still extremly exciting and packed with action.

[b] The Characters are Alive: [/b] Everything has a personality, Glados, Wheatley, even Chell who is voiceless has a personality in the fact that she keeps trying even in her darkest moments.

[b] The Story is Compelling and Heartbreaking:[/b] If you played Portal 2, you know exactly what I'm talking about.
Mind-blowing.
Щикарно (нет)

[h1]LE jeu intemporel ![/h1]

Des puzzles hallucinants, une histoire folle, une ambiance unique.
Toute les bonnes idées du premier volet ont été reprises et alors qu'on pensait avoir fait le tour du gameplay avec Portal premier du nom, on se rend compte en avançant dans Portal 2 que ce n'était qu'une ébauche...

[b]Si vous êtes amateur d'énigmes et que vous n'avez pas encore mis la main sur ce titre, il faut vite remedier à cette erreur ![/b]

Um jogo simplesmente única
Historia muito bem feita com uma boa construção de personagens.
Trilha Sonora simplesmente impecável
Puzzles muito bem feitos com uma evolução de dificuldade e de complexidade que o proprio jogo vai te adaptando e você nem ao menos percebe isso mudando, mas quando você para pra comparar puzzles do meio/fim do jogo comparados com os primeiros você percebe uma nítida diferença, tanto que quando você zera pela segunda vez o tempo díminui MUITO.
Possuí um multiplayer que é muito bem feito para jogar com um amigo, onde um depende do outro, não é simplesmente um multiplayer onde da pra você carregar, você realmente depende do seu amigo.
Tudo isso somado ao workshop que amplia o jogo a milhares da mapas.
Basicamente, um dos melhores já jogos produzidos

Este juego tiene el mejor cooperativo que se haya hecho nunca. Las camaras de la comunidad parecen que no tienen fin. La historia, si bien un pelin corta, esta llena de detalles con unos personajes muy logrados. En definitiva, un juego que hay que jugar si o si.

El tema de las camaras a dia de hoy (2017) sigue siendo una chaladura que le da al juego horas y horas hasta el infinito para jugar con el colega. Posiblemente el mejor cooperativo hasta la fecha.
Прошел на одном дыхании еще пару лет назад. Жаль тех чувств уже не вернуть, Но всеравно порой приятно вернутся и погрузится в воспоминания.
Jogo antigo, porém fantástico. Muito divertido, além de te deixar pensando muito sobre como passar dos níveis. Recomendo!

Portal 2 получилась отличным продолжением Portal и во всём превзашла первую часть серии.Процесс этой игры основан на прохождении тестовых камер с помощью устройства создания порталов.В игре есть всё: запутанный и трогательный сюжет,атмосферное музыкальное сопровождение,интересный дизайн.Также в ней присутствует большое количество юмора и пасхалок.В этой части было добавлено совместное прохождение тестовых камер и функция их создания,что даёт возможность вечного тестирования среды порталов.
CAQUE IS A L AIL

I absolutely love this game. It is my all time favorite game. I've beat it at least 7 times at this point. I just love it! I like the game play, the story, the singleplayer and multi-player. I just love everything about this game! 10/10 I definitely recodmend.
I love this game! I love the puzzles and the humor. Love that the game works as it's own tutorial. ALL-TIME CLASSIC!
Mind bending physics fun makes a fantastic return in Portal 2 with great characters, good humor, and good plot twists! An absolute must for fans of the original!
The cake is a lie!

This game is a cult classic among PC gamers alike, and for good reason.
It did not deviate much from the formula of Portal, added a new, cooperative gamemode with an entirely new storyline on the side, and improved upon every single aspect of the game apart from the options menu, which is slightly lacking.

Graphically this game still looks decent after 5 years. It isn't as gorgeous as The Witcher III on ultra, but it'll do. The soundtrack is glorious and filled with fitting music, and the control scheme works perfectly like in all VALVe games. 
The story is well put-together and has brilliant voice acting from the amazing Stephen Merchant and Ellen Mclain. The chemistry between the characters, the player, and eachother makes for one of the best and funny stories I have ever seen.

Gameplaywise it's the same as in Portal, but with added puzzle mechanics like lasers, gels, faith plates, funnels. no more high-energy pellets and more. It expands on what Portal did, but by adding in a few of the levels of the first portal, also teaches players new to the franchise how the game works. The puzzles never get stale because of the amount of chemistry the character interaction brings along, and finishing a puzzle to hear GLaDOS being a cynical bitch to you again really feels like a great reward.

If you liked Portal, you'll like this game. If not, you should probably stay away.

Portal 2 is an amazing game for all, and here's why I think you should play it.

First off, level design is intricate and puzzles are difficult at times, which is good, because we don't have a lot of difficult puzzle games. Character design, and voice lines are on point, well maybe because most of the cast is robotic, but still, the humor is first off, funny, and jokes are on point as well. I think that Portal 2 should be up there with HL2, one of the best games ever created. 

Multiplayer is also very well designed, because it makes puzzles more co-op and harder for 1 person. People interact with you in this game, and it's multiplayer, which is surprising for a Portal game. 

Characters are a key reason why this game deserves a 10/10, characters like Glados, Wheatley, and Cave Johnson made the game 4x more funnier than the last, it even gave me quite a lot of laughs. 

Overall, this games 10/10. An actual 10/10.
Timeless Must play game for anyone who calles themselves a gamer.
